document.full_text: private equity firm kkr  posted higher-than-expected quarterly earnings as the value of its private equity investments rose 6.5 percent and fee income increased, the company said on wednesday.
document.title: kkr earnings beat estimates, portfolio value up
lines_and_colors: private equity firm kkr  posted higher-than-expected quarterly earnings as the value of its private equity investments rose 6.5 percent and fee income increased, the company said on wednesday.
